user_query: I'm a music producer and I'm looking for new talent in the adult alternative genre. Can you provide me with the list of greatest of all time adult alternative artists on Billboard? Also, give me the Deezer links for their top tracks and any information about their upcoming projects.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the list of greatest of all time adult alternative artists from Billboard.
For each artist in the retrieved list, fetch their top tracks from Deezer.
Gather information on any upcoming projects for each artist.
